definition: sick note/medical certificate for sick leave

sentences.english: They looked at long-term sick leave (of over 90 days) and hospital admission rates.
sentences.chinese: 他们关注的重点是超过90天的长时间病假和住院率。

sentences.english: They take a day of sick leave rather than admit to being off because of pet bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 他们宁可请病假而不愿承认因为痛失宠物而请假。

sentences.english: Tracks yearly vacation, overtime compensation, sick leave and other leave information.
sentences.chinese: 管理和追踪年假，调休，病假和其他假期信息。

sentences.english: So he telephoned Mr. Wang to ask for sick leave.
sentences.chinese: 所以他打电话向王先生请病假。

sentences.english: Arising tone can not be used here.
sentences.chinese: 相比看北京病假条这儿不能用升调。

sentences.english: Employers could also adopt policies such as offering workers paid sick leave.
sentences.chinese: 雇主还可以采用诸如向雇员提供有薪病假的政策。

sentences.english: Don\'t take days off sick-unless you are.
sentences.chinese: 不要请病假好几日，除非真的生病了。

sentences.english: Some staff called to ask for sick leaves.
sentences.chinese: 有几个员工打来电话请病假。

sentences.english: Some staff members grumbling about the new sick-leave policy.
sentences.chinese: 一些员工对于新的病假制度抱怨连连。

sentences.english: The aetiological fraction attributable to differences in work environment exposures was calculated to be 40%.
sentences.chinese: 工作环境暴露的差异约占病假可归因危险的40%。

sentences.english: If employing units find it necessary to study the sick leave wage system, guidance must be provided.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位有必要研究病假工资制度，积极予以引导。

sentences.english: Can I ask about the vocation and sick leave?
sentences.chinese: 我能问一下假期和病假的情况吗？

sentences.english: Going to other place to work using sick leave.
sentences.chinese: 借故请病假往他处工作者。

sentences.english: Can I ask the vacation and sick leave?
sentences.chinese: 我能问一下假期和病假的情况吗？

sentences.english: How to terminate employees who have taken long-term sick leave?
sentences.chinese: 如何解除长期请病假的员工？

sentences.english: She takes a sick leave, because she had a bad cold.
sentences.chinese: 她患了重感冒，所以请了病假。

definition: leave of absence for a personal matter
official leave from work (e.g. maternity leave, sick leave or leave to attend to official business)
leave of absence request (from work or school)/excuse note/CL:張|张[zhang1]
to be absent from work or school
sick note/medical certificate for sick leave
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
